snippet.title: SNOW 1.0.0 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
SNOW has officially left Steam Early Access and is now out of Beta! Crytek is publishing this CRYENGINE powered indie game as a joint venture with Poppermost & Wasted Studios. 

Download the game for free now, and purchase The Ultimate Bundle to unlock all mountains, events, features, and cosmetics for just $19.99!

store.steampowered.com/app/244930

SNOW 1.0.0 brings back multiplayer, mountain progression tracker, collectibles, and the X Games Aspen 2018 map! Learn more here: snowthegame.com/news/snow-1-0-out-now/

www.snowthegame.com

Video made by Buler
youtube.com/buleredits
instagram.com/_Buler/

Music by Kasket Club
soundcloud.com/kasketclub/travel
